nodes.text: So there is no inherent contradiction between Islam and democracy
Islam should not be cathegorized as a religion that aims at violence
And like all other religions Islam aims to help people in their daily lives and bring happiness
Government has the same aim   and democracy as a system of government  has proven to be more effective and better than any other system.
Two positions can be said to be contradictory when their principles and goals are opposite
Islam is a religion for all of us who believe in it
There are bad people who are giving us a bad time at this particular juncture. But the same applies to all religions
We do not condemn other religions for few bad people
